page.title: 04Toys
page.content: When I was 8 years old I used to play games like snakes and ladders but now I am 11 I do jig-saws,play monopoly and listen to tapes.My favourite toys are my bike and my computer,which is a Commodore 64.I have got about 74 games for it.My favourite games are Bruce Lee or Frogger.The first game I got for my computer was Frogger and the last one I got was Bruce Lee.I have had my computer for about two years now.I use my bike and computer the most of all.My sister uses toys like dolls and board games like Donkey Kong.My sister and I don't usually play with our toys together because we are usually playing with somebody else or falling out with each other. By Matthew Row,aged 11.
